rationale: Whilst the species is collected for the aquarium trade, this has been occurring since it was discovered in the 1980s.  Although it has a small distribution range, other areas where the species is likely to occur are beyond the reach of fishermen.  For these reasons, the species is assessed as Least Concern.
evaluator: Collen, B., Darwall, W., Ram, M. & Smith, K. (SRLI Freshwater Fish Evaluation Workshop)
